description: Read the latest bulletins and newsletters for taxi and private hire operators

texts: {"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Consultations"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Brixton at night"}

Lambeth Council is consulting on Brixton at night and is interested in ideas and views to help shape a new strategy for the area. You have until tomorrow, Friday 24 May to share your views on Brixton at night with Lambeth.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Bath Road traffic management proposals"}
Hounslow Council is consulting on traffic management proposals in Bath Road. You have until Bank Holiday Monday 27 May to let Hounslow know what you think about the proposals.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Penalty Charges Notices (PCNs) in Barnet"}

Barnet Council is consulting on proposals to increase the charges for the PCNs they issue. You can find details of the current and proposed changes on Barnet's website and have until Wednesday 31 July to let Barnet know what you think about the proposed changes.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Olinda Road"}
Hackney Council is consulting on proposals to ease traffic issues along Olinda Road and Craven Park Road. The consultation is open until Sunday 26 May. Visit the council's website for details.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Hans Road / Basil Street / Walton Place junction proposals"}

Kensington and Chelsea Council is consulting on proposed changes at the Hans Road / Basil Street / Waldon Place junction. Taxi drivers who use the ranks at Harrods should respond to the consultation. You have until Friday 31 May to let the council know what you think .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Cycling and walking improvements between Hackney and the Isle of Dogs"}
We're consulting on proposals to improve cycling and walking between Hackney and the Isle of Dogs. You have until Friday 21 June to give us your feedback on the proposals.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Redbridge air quality action plan"}

Redbridge Council is consulting on a new air quality action plan. Details of the plan and new proposals are available on the council's website. You have until Sunday 23 June to let Redbridge know what you think of their new plan.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Phoenix Road"}
Camden Council is consulting on changes to Phoenix Road and you have until Monday 27 May 2019 to share your views with the council.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"West Hill area traffic management scheme"}
Wandsworth Council is trialling a new traffic management scheme in the West Hill area. The trial will run for six months. You have until 31 August 2019 to share your views on the trial.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Romford masterplan"}

Havering Council is developing a masterplan for Romford . You can find details of the masterplan on Havering Council's website and have until June 2019 to share your priorities, ideas and aspirations for Romford.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Electric vehicle charging survey for taxi and private hire drivers"}
Zero Carbon Futures is conducting a short survey among taxi and private hire drivers to find out their experiences of charging and requirements for the future. Take the survey .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Brent Cross West Station"}
Barnet Council is consulting on proposals for Brent Cross Station West. You can review the designs on the Council's website and have until Saturday 1 June to let Barnet know what you think .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Holborn Vision and Urban Strategy"}

Camden Council is consulting on a new vision and urban strategy for Holborn. Details of the proposals plus drop-in sessions are available on Camden's website. You have until Wednesday 3 July to share your views with Camden on their proposals.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Proposed improvements between Wood Lane and Notting Hill Gate"}

We're consulting on proposals to transform roads in west London through four connected neighbourhood improvement schemes between Wood Lane and Notting Hill Gate. You have until Sunday 16 June to view our proposal s and let us know what you think.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Bromley Town Centre parking review"}
Bromley Council is reviewing parking arrangements in Bromley Town Centre and consulting on proposed changes. You have until Friday 24 May to let Bromley know what you think of their proposals.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Electric vehicle charging points in Hammersmith"}
Hammersmith and Fulham is inviting requests for locations for new electric vehicle charging points. You have until 1 April 2020 to submit a request .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Other consultations"}
Find out more about other current TfL consultations .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Taxi and Private Hire notices"}
